name: Genaros
relicBonuses: After the bearer is damaged by an attack or spell, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
This relic and its bearer deal additional damage with attacks and spells equal to 10% of the damage the bearer has taken in the current battle.
After the bearer takes damage, it recovers {STAT_health} equal to 50% of the amount of damage taken.
At the end of the bearer's turn, it {ACTION_provokes} and gains 10% Current and Maximum {STAT_health}.
The bearer gains 20% more Maximum {STAT_health} from stat-boosting effects.
The bearer takes 3% less damage for each time it has been damaged in the current battle.
After the bearer {ACTION_provokes}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
When the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a spell, the damage has a 35% chance to be based on its Current {STAT_health} instead of {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence}.
After the bearer takes damage from an attack or spell, a random enemy takes 20% of that damage as well.
The first time the bearer is killed, it resurrects with 100% {STAT_health} and gains 50% stats (other than {STAT_health}).
title: God of Strife
